title: nambide ninna pAdava
sahitya:
nambide ninna pAdava vEnkaTaraMana nambide ninna pAdava


anupallavi

  nambide ninna pAdAmbuja yugaLava candadi salahO mandaradharane


caraNam 1    tandeyAgi nInE tAyiyu nInE ninnaya pAda hokku jIvisutihenu 
ghakkane jnAnava akkaradindale koDu makkaLa mANikya rukmiNiyarasa
    caraNam 2    maredu mAyadoLu muLugide mAya vahitu ariyadAde mareyade 
ennanu salaho krpAnidhi varada shrI vEnkaTa purandara viTTala
